languages.text: {n}Вы вытягиваете странный предмет из-под ботвы. На свет показывается человеческая рука, грубо отрезанная от тела по локтевому суставу. Лошадь за вашей спиной беспокойно принюхивается и вытягивает шею.{/n}
{n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы вытягиваете странный предмет из-под ботвы. На свет показывается человеческая рука, грубо отрезанная от тела по локтевому суставу. Лошадь за вашей спиной беспокойно принюхивается и вытягивает шею.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}
{n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

{n}You pull out the handkercher and examine it. The name "Elsa" is embroidered on it. At that moment, the head detaches from the corpse with a wet squelch: the young woman's face is twisted in an unnatural grin, part of her mouth drooping to the side like a wax moulding. The head rolls toward the fence, leaving a bloody trail in its wake. The horse cranes its neck and sniffs.{/n}
{n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

{n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你从垃圾山中取出了那个奇怪的东西，那原来是某个人的前臂，从肘部被粗暴地切断。你身后的马嗅了嗅，伸长了脖子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从垃圾山中取出了那个奇怪的东西，那原来是某个人的前臂，从肘部被粗暴地切断。你身后的马嗅了嗅，伸长了脖子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Extraes el misterioso objeto del montón y compruebas que se trata de un antebrazo humano, cercenado toscamente a la altura del codo. Detrás de ti, el caballo estira el cuello y olfatea el aire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Garip nesneyi yığından çekip çıkarıyorsun. Ortaya çıkan şey, dirsekten kabaca koparılmış bir insan ön kolu. Arkandaki at, kokuyu alıp boynunu uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Garip nesneyi yığından çekip çıkarıyorsun. Ortaya çıkan şey, dirsekten kabaca koparılmış bir insan ön kolu. Arkandaki at, kokuyu alıp boynunu uzatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ゴミの山から奇妙なものを引っ張り出す。現れたのは人間の腕で、肘のところで大雑把に切断されている。後ろの馬は匂いをクンクンと嗅ぎ、その首を伸ばす。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ゴミの山から奇妙なものを引っ張り出す。現れたのは人間の腕で、肘のところで大雑把に切断されている。後ろの馬は匂いをクンクンと嗅ぎ、その首を伸ばす。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous extirpez l'étrange objet de l'amas. Il en ressort un avant-bras humain grossièrement sectionné au niveau du coude. Derrière vous, le cheval renifle ostensiblement en tendant le cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You pull out the strange object from the pile. What emerges is a human forearm, crudely severed at the elbow. The horse behind you sniffs and cranes its neck.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du ziehst das seltsame Ding aus dem Haufen. Es ist ein menschlicher Unterarm, brutal am Ellbogen abgetrennt. Das Pferd hinter dir schnaubt und reckt den Hals.{/n}
